entry.title: BIP sighash_noinput
entry.summary: In this context, ZmnSCPxj raises a concern about the name of a flag in a certain program. The flag's name, "SIGHASH_REUSE_VULNERABLE," is deemed uninformative about the function it serves. ZmnSCPxj proposes two alternative names that better reflect the flag's purpose: "SIGHASH_NOINPUT_REUSE_VULNERABLE" and "SIGHASH_NOINPUT_VULNERABLE."
